text: “Ajarchu ning inngamna kha asiin thei,” tia Jisu'n aleimasang. “Kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kati khachu anchamru tiatbit kalok inngamna ningnei inchu, nangni'n hiwa ching diang tiningte, ‘hiwa hinna inphut soson inthonro!’ halli khawa khan inthonsik eii. Halli nangni thomatormak sik iteii omnuni!” 17:20. Manuscript lekkhat in alam 21 inthundel:Takkha bungeile inruoiya Pathian nina khan bit hiwa rakip hi apuut mator; iteii khat innum matormak (Mk 9:29 khan enru)  Matt 21:21; Mk 11:23; 1 Cor 13:2
